page.title: 08DRUMNADROCHIT,POP SURVEY
page.content: We have conducted a survey to find our {teenagers}interests in{music}over the area of our school which consists of 82 pupils.Most peoples likes or dislikes are influenced by the BBC1 programme{Top of The Pops}about 75% of the school watch it.Other people are influenced by the{Radio Stations}like Radio 1,Luxembourg and Moray Firth, these radio stations are pop stations. Only a very small percentage listen to other stations which are not pop. {Pop music}had more than half the votes.Pop music or{New Wave}consists of groups like Wham and Paul Young.The next most popular is{Heavy Metal.}Few people like Folk,Country and Western, New Romantic,Scottish music,Punk and Classical.About 33% of the school buy {records}regularly.The rest of the people only buy them when they can afford it.
